alert.note: Alert for Bates; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 8:27PM CDT until June 07 at 2:13PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Marmaton River near Nevada affecting Vernon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County. Osage River near Schell City affecting Vernon and Bates Counties. Osage River at Taberville affecting St. Clair County. For the Little Osage River Basin...including Fulton, Horton...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Marmaton River Basin...including Fort Scott, Nevada...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Osage River Basin...including Schell City, Taberville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Osage River near Schell City. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.5 feet, the main road of the Schell Osage Conservation Area floods west of the conservation office. The north campground main road of the Schell Osage Conservation area floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.6 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 830 PM CDT.
